the Waylayman speaks:'To the West there is a village, to your North there is a forest and to the East is a bandit camp.'

forest.text: You arrive at the forest, as you do you see a Witch.
the witch walks up from her hut and asks, 'who might you be and why are you in my village' the young witch states

well hello {scenes.variable}, ive got a task for you which i will reward but you must do something for me first, im no warrior so i dont venture too deep into the forest but maybe you can, there a special herb i need in the west get taht for me and i will reward you
You venture deep and come across two plants next to each other ones is a herb and the other is a flower
You sucessfully make it back to the witch, you give her the item and she begins to check it
she states 'This is not the correct plant. However if you go to the Obsidan, near the mountain then this will be disregarded' she pauses then 'there a better plant i want get  that and we are fine'
This is the one, as a reward I shall give you this antidote to cure poisons, 'feel free to visit any time for help'
the witch gave you intruction about a mine that she would like you to optionally get, you decide to go that way
You sneak into the mine, you hear noises you managing to walk your way into the dark cave, and see a glowing flower, you pick it but you hear noises behind you on the way back
it appears goblins are in this abandoned mine and must now make you way out without them spotting you, or if you feel strong fight them
you decide to follow the tunnel going up, and finally you are on the top of the mountain, then you spot the dragon

village.text: You have arrived at the village
You arrive at the village and you are greeted by an farmer. The farmer tells you about the Elders Hut and the Manor
He asks you to help them and explains the lord is trying to crush the farmers rebellion that has occured in the village due to tax increases
'please will you help us' he exclaims
you decide to help the farmers to fight the Lords Army.As you fight off the army, you are stopped by the peasants rebellion

hey thank for helping here some gold, perhaps you can help with a dragon problem as well, i can send a few soldiers your way

you decide to risk the jump

C2chase.text:
The player changes into a new time period, as the watch was glowing now and it opened a new path for him towards an office.
 As you enter the office, there is a note that talks about a ritual to beat the dragon. 
 Before you can move any further, a man appears, who starts running away from you.
. You chase him using your path from the watch. When you speak to him he seems to want to undo all the actions you have done. 
 The enemey assilant tells you to stop, you do not know what you are dealing with, he says. Then he shifts away into another dimension

As you attempt to follow him using your watch, you see you are now at a shipyard. You can either go North or South, 
 which way do you want to go. 

 1. south 2. north

You head north 
 You reach the cargo hold of the shipyard. You see great ships being loaded with crates. You hear voices coming from the right side of the reception area; they don't sound friendly.
You go south and find nothing

cargoMain.text: a person walks by you decide to hide

You see two crates: one marked with a dragon symbol and the other unmarked. Which one do you hide in? 

 1. marked 2. unmarked
You go towards the crate marked with the dragon symbol
You go towards the unmarked crate

You enter the unmarked crate. 
 The watch glows and transforms, seemingly upgraded in a way you instinctively recognise

You hide in the crate, listening as the voices grow fainter and fainter 
 The watch glows and transforms, seemingly upgraded in a way you instinctively recognise.

You go into the marked crate. Inside, you find bags upon bags of drugs. There’s a Chinese man who glares at you, his eyes narrowing. 
 He doesn't seem pleased to see you. He shouts, 'What are you doing here?' His voice echoes through the crate, making you flinch.

ship.conditions: determine from executionfunc // this is an old version doesnt need to do this follow the standard developed, options 1,2
ship.text: As you explore the ship, you stumble upon a stack of papers. Some are yellowed with rage

while others look as if they’re from a time yet to come. Among them, you find a drawing of your watch. 
 Instantly, you feel your understanding of the watch deepen, as if the very sight of the picture unlocks hidden knowledge within you. 
 What secrets could this watch be holding? 
 The watch glows and transforms, seemingly upgraded in a way you instinctively recognise
Having no other option you sprint your way as they fire guns on you, you manage to escape their sight but now mmust find somewhere new to hide,
Where do you hide, there a crate just randomly out and theres a small building with the lights on

You reach the reception area, finding it deserted. The reception desk is empty. 
 Do you take a moment to look around before venturing into the backroom?
you choose to not look around

You scan the reception area and spot a revolver lying on a table. The weight of the situation hits you as you pick it up.  
 A door labelled 'Head Office' is locked, but the backroom is unlocked

backroom.text: You enter the backroom and immediately spot two men. Their expressions harden as they recognize you. They advance, clearly in league with the man who attacked you earlier

Quickly, you take out your revolver and aim at one of the men. You shoot, and he falls to the ground. 
 The other man is momentarily stunned but then advances. Before he can take out his own gun, you shoot him as well. 
 You are stunned at your own reflexes; shooting those men seemed second nature...

With no weapon of your own, one of the two men takes out his gun and shoots you. Your watch glows, distracting the men, and you flee. 
 You decide to hide in a nearby crate and promptly pass out 
 You wake up groggy. Hours must have passed. You go back into the backroom and the room looks different. 
 Notes that weren't there before are now scattered on the table. You read them—they seem to outline a timeline
after successfully shooting the two men you make it too an office in a hurry

backroom.conditions: then inputHandler(if action == yes: give items)
backroom.text: With the two unconscious men at your feet, you face a decision: Do you take a moment to look around for more clues, or do you leave quickly?

You unlock the office door and find it completely empty, except for a mysterious box, you discover a map that appears to chart all the paths your watch can travel through time. Every twist and turn laid out, waiting for you to explore
